mapper.select: SELECT bab_no, bab_id, bab_title, bab_category, bab_hit, bab_date FROM bab_board
SELECT sul_no, sul_id, sul_title, sul_category, sul_hit, sul_date FROM sul_board
SELECT nol_no, nol_id, nol_title, nol_category, nol_hit, nol_date FROM nol_board
SELECT bab_no, bab_id, bab_title, bab_category, bab_hit, bab_date, bab_text, bab_url FROM bab_board WHERE bab_no = #{bab_no}
SELECT sul_no, sul_id, sul_title, sul_category, sul_hit, sul_date, sul_text, sul_url FROM sul_board WHERE sul_no = #{sul_no}
SELECT nol_no, nol_id, nol_title, nol_category, nol_hit, nol_date, nol_text, nol_url FROM nol_board WHERE nol_no = #{nol_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bab_board ( bab_no, bab_id, bab_title, bab_category, bab_pw, bab_hit, bab_date, bab_step, bab_depth, bab_group, bab_text, bab_url ) VALUES ( seq_bab_no.nextval, #{bab_id}, #{bab_title}, #{bab_category}, #{bab_pw}, 0, TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY.MM.DD.HH24:MI'),'1', '1', '1', #{bab_text}, #{bab_url} )

INSERT INTO sul_board ( sul_no, sul_id, sul_title, sul_category, sul_pw, sul_hit, sul_date, sul_step, sul_depth, sul_group, sul_text, sul_url ) VALUES ( seq_sul_no.nextval, #{sul_id}, #{sul_title}, #{sul_category}, #{sul_pw}, 0, TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY.MM.DD.HH24:MI'),'1', '1', '1', #{sul_text}, #{sul_url} )

INSERT INTO nol_board ( nol_no, nol_id, nol_title, nol_category, nol_pw, nol_hit, nol_date, nol_step, nol_depth, nol_group, nol_text, nol_url ) VALUES ( seq_nol_no.nextval, #{nol_id}, #{nol_title}, #{nol_category}, #{nol_pw}, 0, TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY.MM.DD.HH24:MI'),'1', '1', '1', #{nol_text}, #{nol_url} )
mapper.select: SELECT bab_re_no, bab_re_writer, bab_re_content, bab_re_date, bab_re_board_no FROM bab_reply WHERE bab_re_board_no = #{bab_re_board_no} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(bab_re_no) asc
SELECT sul_re_no, sul_re_writer, sul_re_content, sul_re_date, sul_re_board_no FROM sul_reply WHERE sul_re_board_no = #{sul_re_board_no} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(sul_re_no) asc
SELECT nol_re_no, nol_re_writer, nol_re_content, nol_re_date, nol_re_board_no FROM nol_reply WHERE nol_re_board_no = #{nol_re_board_no} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(nol_re_no) asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BAB_REPLY ( bab_re_no, bab_re_group, bab_re_depth, bab_re_step, bab_re_date, bab_re_writer, bab_re_content, bab_re_category, bab_re_board_no ) VALUES ( #{bab_re_no}, '1', '1', '1', TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY.MM.DD.HH24:MI'), #{bab_re_writer}, #{bab_re_content}, #{bab_re_category}, #{bab_re_board_no} )

INSERT INTO SUL_REPLY ( sul_re_no, sul_re_group, sul_re_depth, sul_re_step, sul_re_date, sul_re_writer, sul_re_content, sul_re_category, sul_re_board_no ) VALUES ( #{sul_re_no}, '1', '1', '1', TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY.MM.DD.HH24:MI'), #{sul_re_writer}, #{sul_re_content}, #{sul_re_category}, #{sul_re_board_no} )

INSERT INTO NOL_REPLY ( nol_re_no, nol_re_group, nol_re_depth, nol_re_step, nol_re_date, nol_re_writer, nol_re_content, nol_re_category, nol_re_board_no ) VALUES ( #{nol_re_no}, '1', '1', '1', TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY.MM.DD.HH24:MI'), #{nol_re_writer}, #{nol_re_content}, #{nol_re_category}, #{nol_re_board_no} )
mapper.select: SELECT bab_no, bab_title, bab_category, bab_hit, CASE WHEN length(bab_text) > 0 THEN SUBSTR(bab_text,1,16)||'...' END bab_text FROM(SELECT bab_no, bab_title, bab_category, bab_text, bab_hit FROM bab_board ORDER BY bab_hit desc) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT sul_no, sul_title, sul_category, sul_hit, CASE WHEN length(sul_text) > 0 THEN SUBSTR(sul_text,1,16)||'...' END sul_text FROM(SELECT sul_no, sul_title, sul_category, sul_text, sul_hit FROM sul_board ORDER BY sul_hit desc) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT nol_no, nol_title, nol_category, nol_hit, CASE WHEN length(nol_text) > 0 THEN SUBSTR(nol_text,1,16)||'...' END nol_text FROM(SELECT nol_no, nol_title, nol_category, nol_text, nol_hit FROM nol_board ORDER BY nol_hit desc) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4
